summary: Skippy, the mischievous son of a wealthy doctor, meets Sooky in poverty-ridden Shantytown, and together they try to save Sooky's pet from a cruel dogcatcher.
cast: Jackie Cooper|Robert Coogan|Mitzi Green|Jackie Searl|Willard Robertson|Enid Bennett|Donald Haines|Helen Jerome Eddy|Guy Oliver|Jack Rube Clifford|Carl R. Botefuhr|Beaudine Anderson|Dannie Mac Grant|Douglas Haig|Payne B. Johnson|Buddy McDonald
keywords: character name as title|nickname as title|bicycle|based on comic strip|dog
title: Skippy
